teaser: The Fed's plans for future stimulus spending. And the rising costs of video game development.
title: PODCAST: Fed tapering and video games
description: The Fed's plans for future stimulus spending. And the rising costs of video game development.
contentencoded:
Changes in U.S. monetary policy could create problems in emerging markets. The global implications of this week's Fed meeting. 

And here in the states, traders expect Federal Reserve to scale back on bond buying. 

With video game development costs now so high, creating a new game from scratch has become a high-stakes business.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 17, 2013
